name: Offal Weighing Game
description:
This is an entry for Gamedev.js jam 2022.  The theme is RAW.

I have chosen to make a game about weighing kidneys

Use the mouse to drag kidneys from the hopper on the left into the carton on the weighing scales on the right. 

The monitor on the right of the scales tells you the target weight range you need to aim for.

Drag with the left mouse button to drag a single kidney

Drag with the right mouse button to drag a group of kidneys

if the carton is too heavy you can drag kidneys back into the hopper.

When the weight target is met the weighed kidneys disappear and a new target is set.

The game ends whenever a kidney falls out of the hopper

I made the game with Godot

The music is by https://pixabay.com/users/slicebeats-21621711/

The menu background is by https://pixabay.com/users/jakubhoopoe-2444176/
